abstract: The overturned verdict in the Amanda Knox case should make us look hard at other murder trials.
snippet: The overturned verdict in the Amanda Knox case should make us look hard at other murder trials.
lead_paragraph: The tragic junior "year" abroad is over, at long last, for Amanda Knox. And for that, we have to thank an Italian legal system that essentially gives every convicted criminal a do-over - more formally, an appeal before fresh eyes. Bravo for Italy.

headline.main: Lessons From the Amanda Knox Case
